channel.title: Hey, Help Me Please
channel.description:
Hello everyone.
Is it possible to use OutLook Express to veiw my hotmail.com emails?

item.title: Hey, Help Me Please
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

But then I get the most weirdest message;
Could not connect to Hotmail as motocross_is@hotmail.com

Hotmail no longer allows access via Outlook Express for free email accounts…

And I’m not buying hotmail -.-

Read full topic

item.title: Hey, Help Me Please
item.dc:creator: @BobDole81 BobDole81
item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

For hotmail, outlook express has never been an issue for me.

Just go to Tools->Accounts and Add->Mail
Choose the name that will be displayed on outgoing emails. Press Next
Enter your hotmail email address. Press Next
Not applicable for hotmail accounts. Press Next
Enter your password.

That’s it.

Read full topic
